For example, you might want to add:

- extra content about what the user will need to complete the form as a 'hide/reveal' component
- some warning text

components.html: Only some types of pages can have additional components

## How to add an additional component

1. Navigate to the page where you want to add the additional component
2. In the top navigation bar, click on 'Properties mode'
3. In the list of properties, click on 'Additional properties'
4. Under 'Additional components' click on 'Add extraComponent'
5. Enter details about the component

heading: Additional components
lede: You can add components below the 'Start' or 'Continue' button - these are called additional components.
